AddressInfo.Title: Ripley Hospital
AddressInfo.AccessComments:
Charge points are located at parking spaces at rear of car park, near building. Charge points are for Hospital users, visitors & staff only during normal
 working week; unrestricted evenings & weekends. Length of stay limited during working hours to active charging period only or duration of Hospital appointment / visiting, as space 
is required for Hospital users. No time restrictions evenings & weekends. The only exception to this is Hospital pool vehicles, which will have a permanent parking space. No parking fees.
